channel.title: My crowns won't change -- tried it client sided
channel.description: I'm trying to change the owner crown on my server (because its an admin crown??? :palm: ) I've added it client sided and the image shows up when referenced and everything. But it won't show up when someone has an owner status and just talks. It only shows up when using ::news command (which i guess is a generic yell.. ) and the only reason it shows up then was because i edited what image it was referencing... so whats the deal here im confused lol.

item.title: My crowns won't change -- tried it client sided
item.dc:creator: @Pkmasterpwnz Pkmasterpwnz
item.description:
@Pkmasterpwnz wrote:

I’m trying to change the owner crown on my server (because its an admin crown??? :palm: )
I’ve added it client sided and the image shows up when referenced and everything. But it won’t show up when someone has an owner status and just talks. It only shows up when using ::news command (which i guess is a generic yell… ) and the only reason it shows up then was because i edited what image it was referencing… so whats the deal here im confused lol.

Read full topic
item.source: My crowns won't change -- tried it client sided
